text: Tomčo Sokolov (born March 1, 1984) is a former Macedonian professional basketball Power forward.http://www.sport.com.mk/?itemid=9E35448819538740A1F2A1A07A3F50A4http://ekipa.mk/kozhuv- se-zasili-so-tomcho-sokolov-i-so-aleksandar-shterjov/ in Macedonia. ==Professional career== During his career, Sokolov played in Croatia, Portugal, Romania, Russia, Tunisia, Turkey, Slovakia, Bosnia and Herzegovina and Slovenia. On 18 March 2015, Sokolov has signed with KK Maribor. ==References== ==External links== * at basketball.eurobasket.com * at basketball.realgm.com * at proballers.com Category:Living people Category:1984 births Category:Macedonian men's basketball players Category:Slovenian men's basketball players Category:Macedonian expatriate basketball people in Croatia Category:Sportspeople from Strumica Category:Macedonian expatriate basketball people in Portugal Category:Macedonian expatriate basketball people in Romania Category:Macedonian expatriate basketball people in Russia Category:Macedonian expatriate basketball people in Tunisia Category:Macedonian expatriate basketball people in Turkey Category:Macedonian expatriate basketball people in Slovakia Category:Macedonian expatriate basketball people in Bosnia and Herzegovina Category:Macedonian expatriate basketball people in Slovenia Category:Power forwards (basketball)
title: Tomčo Sokolov
